pcs.name: Gaming PC - 3080 Ti & i9-10850K
pcs.description:
—Beautiful, Massive Gaming PC-Ask about trade-in!—

Performs great and will run anything with ease (smoke-free).

Specs:
• GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 Ti EVGA
• CPU: Intel Core i9-10850K
• Motherboard: ASUS ROG Strix Z490-E WiFi
• RAM: 32GB Corsair Dominator @ 360MT/s
• Storage: 2TB Total (1TB SSD + 1TB HDD)
• PSU: 750 Watt RM750x
• Cooler: Corsair 280mm AIO
• Case: Corsair 5000X RGB
• Extras: 10 RGB fans, CableMod kit

peripherals.name: Gaming Mouse Pro
peripherals.description: High precision gaming mouse with customizable buttons and RGB lighting.
